title: How would you rate League of Legends overall?
body: I've been thinking about going back to League of Legends after playing HotS for some time. The stun-burst meta is very stale, and hero diversity is suffering as a result. The newer heroes (except Greymane) have been very weak, and Blizzard is taking way too long to fix anything. Players have been dropping HotS like a hot potato, and Blizzard doesn't seem to care at all.
